TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer that has spread from the surface of the cervix to tissue deeper in the cervix or to other parts of the body.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "invasive cervical cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "c치ncer invasivo del cuello uterino"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: C치ncer que se ha diseminado desde la superficie del cuello uterino hasta lo m치s profundo de este o a otras partes del cuerpo.
